name: Megaloot
storyline: Megaloot is an addictive Inventory Management Roguelite RPG, where meticulous loot management paves the way for creating diverse and powerful builds. Combine loot strategically to craft dominating setups, and unlock new deck cards to become an ultimate power hunter.
summary: Minimalistic Rogue-Lite RPG with big focus on itemization where you craft your own playstyle inside the endless tower.
